    • getAllAds

      public ResponseWrapperAds getAllAds()
      Receive all Ads. The repository method JpaRepository.findAll() is used to get a List of all ads.
      Specified by:
      getAllAds in interface AdsService
      Returns:
      ResponseWrapperAds instance with number of founded ads and List of AdsDto

    • removeAds

      public void removeAds(long id, org.springframework.security.core.Authentication authentication)

      Specified by:
      removeAds in interface AdsService
      Parameters:

    • getAdsById

      public Ads getAdsById(long id)
      Receive ad by id. The repository method CrudRepository.findById(Object) is used.
      Specified by:
      getAdsById in interface AdsService
      Parameters:
      id - identification number of ad
      Returns:
      Ads instance
      Throws:
      AdsNotFoundException - if no ad was found
